Text: How did you convert .bik files to avi?

Lenschow123, you can go get RAD Video Tools, which are used to play and convert .bik files. To convert to AVI is built it, it can convert to any exporting codec already on your machine, such as xvid, h264, or anything else supplied by a pack such as CCCP.

My bad, just saw your comment....RAD is your best bet, although i ended up using bigasoft total converter since i had some issues with RAD on this pc.

you gotta extract the .vpk's to access the .biks first then convert.
